name: The Escape (itch) (Nate)
description:
The Escape is my entry for the 2020 Global Game jam.  The theme this year was "Repair", so in this game, you are tasked with repairing two things : a wall to keep them out, and a bridge to make your escape.  Build up the wall with the bricks, lay down boards to fix the bridge. 

You got this.
